text: Krk () is a town in Primorje-Gorski Kotar County, Croatia. It is the main settlement of the island of Krk. In 2021, 6,816 people lived there. It is on the southwest coast of the island and is the historical seat of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Krk. == References == Category:Towns in Croatia Category:Primorje-Gorski Kotar County
title: Krk (town)
